attributes.action: Make GSCE easier for Year 10 due to sit in 2022
attributes.additional_details: Make the GCSE'S for Year 10 due to sit in 2022 easier like what was made easier for the Students in Year 11 2021. They missed out equally as much work as us and they had the papers made easier. This would be totally reasonable and would firstly help students, secondly it would relive students of stress and lastly would probably help improve young teens learning abilities
attributes.background: To Make the GSCE'S for Year 10 easier as Covid-19 has had a huge impact on students in Year 10. For them to actually speak to students and Understand the struggles and frustration that they are going through instead of the government just going ahead as normal

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Reduce content for 2022 A-level and GCSE exams
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566803
